title: Great visit in 2016, we're going back this summer!
text:
We took a chance that this hotel would serve our purpose of spending 4 days in and around Central Park. Our quiet, beautifully appointed king size room faced 77th St and we felt like we were actually living as residents of the upper west side. The Belleclaire is just a few blocks from Central Park yet there was plenty to do one block in either direction, Broadway to our right and Amsterdam Ave to our left. The staff was very accommodating, suggesting out of the way restaurants and providing transportation when we decided to venture out of the immediate area. We have booked a return stay in July 2017 for a longer stay. As a member of the hotel group (Triumph Hotels) you get great perks and rates!
